dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: This project analyses and treats data according to five processes: waste paper pulping, paper making process, chemical production, transport of raw materials and products, and wastewater treatment.
本课题按废纸制浆、抄纸过程、 化学品生产、原料产品运输、废水处理 5 个过程进行数据分析处理。

technology.technologicalApplicability: Recycled paper production for the purpose of making corrugated cardboard is an industrial process which involves pulping of waste paper and paper making, coupled with chemical production, transportation of raw materials and products, as well as waste water treatment. The resulting product is corrugated base paper, which is primarily used in packaging applications.
废纸再生纸生产用于制造瓦楞原纸，这一工业过程包括废纸制浆、纸张制作以及化学品生产、原料及产品运输和废水处理。所产生的产品是瓦楞基础纸，主要用于包装应用。

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: The eFootprint system is used to create the modules of the process units, enter the data parameters of the process units and analyse the inventory by linking the relationship variables of the process units. In addition, the data analysis process involves allocation procedures, firstly, energy consumption and environmental emissions in the energy production process are allocated to the different process units, and secondly, wastewater pollution loads in the wastewater treatment process are allocated to the different process units.
利用 eFootprint 系统建立各个过程单元模块，输 入各过程单元的数据参数，通过连接各过程单元的关 系变量等操作进行清单分析。另外数据分析过程还涉及分配程序处理，首先能源生产过程中能源消耗及环 境排放需分配至不同过程单元；其次废水处理过程中 废水污染负荷分配至不同过程单元。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: Primary activity level data. Collected through enterprise research, provision by upstream plants, sampling and monitoring, such as resource and energy consumption including coal, waste paper, water, electricity, etc., gas emissions including CO2, NOx, SO2, CO, PM10, Nonmethane Volatile Organic Compound (NMVOC), etc., water emissions including Total Suspended Particu⁃ late (TSP), Chemical Oxygen Demand (COD), Biochemical Oxygen Demand (COD), and Biochemical Oxygen Demand (COD). Total Suspended Particu⁃ late (TSP), Chemical Oxygen Demand (COD), Biochemical Oxygen Demand (BOD), Total Nitrogen (TN), Total Phosphorus (TP), and so on. Total Nitrogen (TN), Total Phosphorus (TP), NO3 -, PO4 3-, Total Suspended Solids (TSS), etc., as well as data on solid waste such as fibre and sludge, hazardous waste such as liquid waste mineral oil, and transport distance of raw materials and products. The data collected is the average statistical data of the enterprise for the whole year of 2019 and reflects the actual production level of the enterprise.2. Sub-activity level data. Data that cannot be obtained from the actual research process, such as data on environmental emissions during the production of relevant chemicals and transport of raw materials and products, will be replaced by data from CLCD-China, ELCD 3.0, Ecoinvent, Ecoinvent 2.2 Public or relevant scientific and technological literature.

初级活动水平数据。通过企业调研、上游厂 家提供、采样监测等途径进行收集，如资源能源消耗 包 括 煤 、 废 纸 、 水 、 电 力 等 ， 气 体 排 放 包 括 CO2、NOx、SO2、CO、PM10、非甲烷挥发性有机物 （Nonmethane Volatile Organic Compound，NMVOC） 等，水 体 排 放 包 括 总 悬 浮 颗 粒 物 （Total Suspended Particu⁃ late，TSP）、化学需氧量 （Chemical Oxygen Demand， COD）、 生 化 需 氧 量 （Biochemical Oxygen Demand， BOD）、 全 氮 （Total Nitrogen， TN）、 全 磷 （Total Phosphorus， TP）、 NO3 − 、PO4 3- 、总 悬 浮 固 体 （Total Suspended Solids，TSS） 等，以及纤维、污泥等固体 废弃物，液态废矿物质油等危险废物，原料产品运输 距离等数据。所收集数据为企业 2019 年全年平均统 计数据，并能反映企业的实际生产水平。2.次级活动水平数据。无法从实际调研过程中 获得的数据，如相关化学品生产、原料产品运输过程 中环境排放等数据，采用中国生命周期基础数据库 CLCD-China、欧盟生命周期数据库 ELCD 3.0、Ecoin⁃ vent，中心商用数据库 Ecoinvent 2.2 Public 或相关科 技文献数据进行替代

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 赵国杰, 游亚杰, & 黄起帅. 基于生命周期评价的瓦楞原纸产品碳足迹评价. 中国造纸 40, 40–44 (2021).
赵国杰, 游亚杰, & 黄起帅. 基于生命周期评价的瓦楞原纸产品碳足迹评价. 中国造纸 40, 40–44 (2021).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: The acquired LCA data for the production of 1000 kg of corrugated base paper from waste paper is to serve as an inventory result, reflecting the consumption of resources and energy, as well as the environmental emissions in each process unit. The framework for data collection is primarily business-to-business (B2B). Primary activity level data are collected through field surveys, provided by upstream manufacturers, and monitoring. Secondary activity level data that cannot be directly obtained are supplemented by databases such as CLCD-China, ELCD 3.0, Ecoinvent, or related scientific literature. It is recommended to use the eFootprint system to input process unit data parameters and carry out inventory analysis. Attention should be paid to allocation procedures during data analysis, especially energy consumption and pollution loads in the wastewater treatment process. For production, focus on chemicals used in quantities greater than 1%/t of paper or environmental impacts exceeding 1% of the total system. Exclude production equipment, building facilities, and packaging materials. Assume a 50% empty load rate for raw material transport.

使用从废纸生产的1000公斤瓦楞原纸的生命周期评价数据，用作展示在每个过程单元的资源消耗、能源消耗和环境排放清单结果。数据收集框架主要为企业间(B2B)。通过现场调研、上游制造商提供的数据和监测采集一级活动数据。直接获得的二级活动数据由数据库如CLCD-China、ELCD 3.0、Ecoinvent或相关科学文献补充。建议使用eFootprint系统输入各个过程单元的数据参数，进行清单分析。在数据分析时应特别注意分配程序，尤其是在能源消耗和废水处理过程中的污染负荷。对于生产过程，重点关注用量大于纸张1%/t或环境影响超过整个系统1%的化学品。不考虑生产设备、建筑设施和包装材料的生产和维护过程。原料产品运输假定空载率为50%。

completeness.common:other: The selection of chemicals used in the production process is based on the principle that the amount used in the production of a functional unit of product is greater than 1%/t of paper, or that the environmental impact of the chemical production process exceeds 1% of the total impact of the corrugated board product system, and that the proportion of non-substantial emission sources (those that emit less than 1% of the total carbon emissions of the product's lifecycle) is no more than 5% of the total emissions. The enterprise produces corrugated cardboard by pulping waste paper without bleaching or deinking, and does not add any chemicals in the pulping process; the chemicals used in the paper-making process are tapioca starch (industrial grade, YY-278C, Hangzhou Paper Friend Technology Co., Ltd.), cyclic pressure reinforcing agent (industrial grade, Beijing Chemical Industry Factory), and ammonium peroxydisulfate (analytically pure, Hangzhou Gaocrystal Fine Chemical Co., Ltd.). In wastewater treatment, ferric polymerised sulphate (industrial grade, Hunan Yide Chemical Co., Ltd.) is used as flocculant.2.Production and maintenance processes related to production equipment, building facilities, production water and packaging materials are not considered.3. The transport process of chemicals and other auxiliary materials is not considered, and it is assumed that the unloading rate of raw materials and products is 50%.

对生产过程中化学品种类的选择，根据功能 单位产品生产中用量大于 1%/t 纸或化学品生产过程 所产生的环境影响超过瓦楞原纸产品系统总影响 1% 为取舍原则，且非实质性排放源 （碳排放量小于该产 品生命周期总碳排放量 1% 的排放源） 的比例不超过 总排放的 5%。企业采用废纸碎解制浆生产瓦楞原 纸，不经过漂白、脱墨等工序，制浆生产过程中不添 加任何化学品；抄纸过程中使用的化学品有木薯淀粉 （工业级，YY-278C，杭州纸友科技有限公司）、环压 增强剂 （工业级，北京化工厂） 及过硫酸铵 （分析 纯，杭州高晶精细化工有限公司）；废水处理中使用 聚合硫酸铁 （工业级，湖南谊德化工有限公司） 作为絮凝剂。2.对生产设备、建筑设施、生产用水、包装材 料相关的生产、维护过程不予考虑。3.化学品及其他辅助材料的运输过程不予考 虑，原料产品运输假定空载率为 50%。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: 硝酸根（化学品生产阶段）
磷酸根（化学品生产阶段）
聚合硫酸铁（废水处理阶段）
固体废弃物（废水处理阶段）
